alert.note: Alert for Mobile Inland (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 6:13PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Mobile County through 700 PM CDT... At 613 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Chunchula, or 5 miles west of Creola, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Midtown Mobile, Downtown Mobile, Prichard, Saraland, Chickasaw, Satsuma, Creola, Chunchula, Axis, I65 And I165, Mobile Regional Airport, I65 And AL 158 and I10 And I65. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
